txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Wet fur from the lesser beasts throughout Bree-land. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'I am certain that these furs will be put to good use. Thank you.'
'Our hunters can barely keep up with demand of fur from the beasts of the land. If you happen upon any wet fur while out hunting, be sure to bring them to me.'
Men of Bree Task: Wet Fur
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of wet fur from the lesser beasts throughout Bree-land.
Deliver the wet fur to Second-watcher Heathstraw
You have been tasked with finding wet fur from the weaker beasts making Bree-land their home. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Wet fur from the lesser beasts throughout Bree-land.
